# Dependencies

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(janitor)
library(qdapRegex)

```

# Data

```{r}


data_journals_and_fields <- read_rds("../../data/processed/psychology/data_journals_and_fields.rds")


```

# Get list of journals

```{r}

list_journals <- data_journals_and_fields |> 
  distinct(journal) |> 
  TC() |> 
  as.data.frame()

write.csv(list_journals, "../../data/processed/psychology/list_journals.csv")

list_journals |> 
  kable() |>
  kable_classic(full_width = FALSE) 

```
